messages.messageBody:
I downloaded the banner as well... It was eazy and it doesn't bother me too
much.... I have no real plans to try to "generate a downline" but I figure
even if I can make $20 per month, that's all right with me. There is really
no way to lose with this deal (ie. no investment)... if you get bored with
it, you can just quit!
check out www.alladvantage.com to get paid to surf the net.
MY user ID# is LUZ-400

messages.msgSnippet: AllAdvantage works by having a veiwbar on your computer screen. As long as you are online, surfing (not checking your email, like OE) you will earn hours. Then
messages.messageBody:
AllAdvantage works by having a veiwbar on your computer screen. As long as
you are online, surfing (not checking your email, like OE) you will earn
hours. Then if you have someone under you (they use your referral) then you
get paid a small portion for their online time, also. It works nicely for
those of us that spend lots of time searching for things (or for those of us
whose DH has discovered EBAY!!!) It is a nice way to make spending $$
Ron and Stephanie
